item.title: Exploring the Advent of Golf Visualization & Its Benefits for High Performance Gameplay
item.description: Golf is 10% movement and 90% psychological, according to renowned golfer Arnold Palmer: the cumulative duration of the golfer's swings and ball strikes over the 72 holes amounts to around seven minutes and 30 seconds, resulting in a remaining duration of 15 hours, 52 minutes, and 30 seconds designated for cognitive processes and decision-making. Yet, what does this 90% entail? How does one harness the mind's immense potential to improve their game on the green?

item.title: Tutorial Acetrace Golf and Disc Golf
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Free Curve Importing a video Manual tracing Trace Golf Importing a video Automatic tracking Manual tracking Line Settings Distance Counter Color segments Introduction Ace Trace is a powerful yet simple tool to trace trajectories on your mobile device and create video highlights like in professional tournament coverage of your favorite sport. You can trace any kind of object; however, the app is optimized mostly for two main activities - golf and disc golf.

item.title: Automatic Tracking ML Algorithm
item.description: Golf has always been a precision sport, and thanks to contemporary technology, players can now raise the bar on their abilities. Our cutting-edge machine learning (ML) tracking algorithm enables our newest feature, automatic tracking for discs and golf balls in movies. Challenges Unfortunately, standard ML detection approaches are not well-suited for detecting and tracking small objects like golf balls. Due to the limitations of deep learning neural networks, it is challenging to extract characteristics about objects that are only a few pixels in diameter.

item.title: Benefits of shot tracking apps
item.description: Golf ball tracking technology has revolutionized the way golfers analyze their shots and improve their game. With the ability to track the ball’s trajectory, speed, and spin in real-time, golfers can now gain a deeper understanding of their shots and make the necessary adjustments to take their game to the next level. One of the key benefits of using a golf ball tracking app is the ability to save and analyze data on previous shots.

item.title: Golf shot tracing apps review
item.description: There are a few different apps available on the AppStore for golf ball tracking Ace Trace Shot Tracer / Golf Shot Tracer - the same app, but two different names The Golf Tracer Let’s see how they compare to each other. Tracing All tracers’ main feature is highlighting the golf ball’s trajectory by tracing its flight path and drawing a line. Automatic tracking Some tracers offer the automatic option that automatically allows tracing the ball trajectory.

item.title: Ace Trace F.A.Q.
item.description: F.A.Q. How do I trace a line? Free Curve - manual editing You can mark a few points in manual mode, and the app will create a smooth line using them. Scroll the video to find the object Select the object by moving the cursor. You can zoom in with 2 fingers Scroll the video again and mark the object by moving the cursor Add 4 to 10 key points throughout the flight Tap [Preview] to preview the result Trace Golf Scroll the timeline to the beginning of the flight, try to be precise Select the ball with the cursor Wait for the automatic tracking to complete - it’s just a few seconds Adjust the landing point by moving the cursor Change the flight duration by moving the marker in the timeline Tap [Preview] button to see the result Check out the iOS Golf tutorial for the tracing golf shots.

item.title: Ace Trace golf and disc golf tutorial
Ace Trace golf tutorial
item.description: Automatic tracking with Ace Trace It works with ball golf drive videos filmed with the camera behind the ball, and the ball moving away from the camera. Make sure the ball is fully visible in the video, so our cutting edge ML algorithm can detect it. Start by opening a video Scroll the timeline to the beginning of the flight, try to be precise Select the ball with the cursor Wait for the automatic tracking to complete - it’s just a few seconds Adjust the landing point by moving the cursor Change the flight duration by moving the marker in the timeline Tap [Preview] button to see the result You can save your video by tapping the [Save] icon on the preview screen Manual tracking If for some reasons the automatic tracking doesn’t produce the best results, you can always use the manual tracking mode.

item.title: Ace Trace on Android
item.description: The good news - the Ace Trace app is available for Android. Currently, the Free Curve and Golf editing modes are fully supported. The golf mode has fully functioning automatic tracking! You can start tracing your lines immediately. Check it out! While we are actively developing new features! Stay tuned. Limitations of the app on the Android platform Android Only specific (standard) video dimensions work due to Android video codec limitations Video stabilization is slightly slower on Android due to the inability to read a video file in several parallel threads, unlike iOS.
